channel.title: Home on PowerShell DevOps and Cloud Conference 2021
channel.description: Recent content in Home on PowerShell DevOps and Cloud Conference 2021

item.description: Head of product for Azure Infrastructure as Code offering (Azure Resource Manager, Bicep) and Governance offering (Azure Blueprints). The Azure deployment and governance services portfolio focuses on enabling enterprise to quickly and easily create and manage Azure resources at scale while providing the necessary guard rails for Enterprises to ensure data security, compliance and enforcing organization standards. Responsible for defining product strategy and core deployment platform services and tools in Azure.

item.title: Code of Conduct
item.description: 1. Purpose A primary goal of GDG Toulouse is to be inclusive to the largest number of contributors, with the most varied and diverse backgrounds possible. As such, we are committed to providing a friendly, safe and welcoming environment for all, regardless of gender, sexual orientation, ability, ethnicity, socioeconomic status, and religion (or lack thereof). GDG Toulouse prides itself on being an open, respectful, and inclusive community. That means the jerky behavior isnâ€™t allowed at GDG meetings.
